comment: /**  * Called by iteration head after it has sent all input for the current superstep through the data channel  * (blocks iteration head).  */
code: /**  * Called by iteration head after it has sent all input for the current superstep through the data channel  * (blocks iteration head).  */ public DataInputView getReadEndAfterSuperstepEnded() {     try {         return queue.take().switchBuffers().     } catch (InterruptedException | IOException e) {         throw new RuntimeException(e).     } }

comment: /**  * Called by iteration tail to save the output of the current superstep.  */
code: /**  * Called by iteration tail to save the output of the current superstep.  */ public DataOutputView getWriteEnd() {     return buffer. }

comment: /**  * Called by iteration tail to signal that all input of a superstep has been processed  * (unblocks iteration head).  */
code: /**  * Called by iteration tail to signal that all input of a superstep has been processed  * (unblocks iteration head).  */ public void notifyOfEndOfSuperstep() {     queue.offer(buffer). }
